net.sf.mmm.persistence.base.jpa

Class AbstractJpaGenericDao<ID,ENTITY extends GenericEntity<ID>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.persistence.base.AbstractGenericDao<ID,ENTITY>
          • net.sf.mmm.persistence.base.jpa.AbstractJpaGenericDao<ID,ENTITY>
  • Type Parameters:
    ID - is the type of the primary key of the managed GenericEntity.
    ENTITY - is the type of the managed entity.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericDao<ID,ENTITY>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRevisionedDaoEnvers, JpaGenericDao

    public abstract class AbstractJpaGenericDao<ID,ENTITY extends GenericEntity<ID>>
extends AbstractGenericDao<ID,ENTITY>
    This is the abstract base-implementation of a GenericDao using the JPA (Java Persistence API).
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • doInitialize

        protected void doInitialize()
        This method performs the actual initialization. It is called when AbstractComponent.initialize() is invoked for the first time.
        ATTENTION:
        When you override this method from a sub-class you need to do a super.AbstractComponent.doInitialize().
        Overrides:
        doInitialize in class AbstractGenericDao<ID,ENTITY extends GenericEntity<ID>>

      • getEntityManager

        protected final javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        This method gets a thread-safe EntityManager. It acts as proxy to an EntityManager associated with the current thread (created when the transaction is opened e.g. via TransactionExecutor).
        Returns:
        the according EntityManager.

      • setEntityManager

        public void setEntityManager(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
        This method injects a thread-safe EntityManager instance that acts as proxy to an EntityManager associated with the current thread (created when the transaction is opened).
        Parameters:
        entityManager - is the EntityManager to inject.

      • findIfExists

        public ENTITY findIfExists(ID id)
                    throws ObjectNotFoundException
        This method loads the GenericEntity with the given id from the persistent store.
        Parameters:
        id - is the primary key of the requested entity.
        Returns:
        the requested entity or null if it does NOT exist in persistent store.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException
        See Also:
        EntityManager.find(Class, Object)

      • getReference

        public ENTITY getReference(ID id)
        This method creates a lazy reference proxy of the GenericEntity with the given id from the persistent store.
        Parameters:
        id - is the primary key of the requested entity.
        Returns:
        the requested entity.
        See Also:
        EntityManager.getReference(Class, Object)

      • save

        public void save(ENTITY entity)
        This method saves the given entity in the persistent store. If the entity is new it is initially created in the persistent store (after commit). If the entity is configured to have a generated primary key a unique ID is generated and assigned. Otherwise, if the entity is already managed , the entity is updated in the persistent store.
        ATTENTION:
        Modifications to a managed entity are automatically saved even if this method has NOT been invoked. However, it is a good practice to always invoke this method after modifying a managed entity to make your code more explicit. This will also guarantee that potential custom-logic of your DAO is invoked.
        Parameters:
        entity - is the GenericEntity to save.

      • deleteById

        public void deleteById(ID id)
        This method deletes the entity identified by the given id from the persistent store.
        Parameters:
        id - is the primary key of the entity to delete.

      • delete

        public void delete(ENTITY entity)
        This method deletes the given entity from the persistent store.
        If the entity is transient this method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        entity - is the GenericEntity to save.
